In the context of the given words, I would suggest using a different approach to describe them. Here are some alternative adjectives that could be used to describe the words:

* Spectacular - magnificent, grand
* Top-notch - excellent, superior
* Satisfaction - fulfillment, contentment
* Pretty - attractive, pleasing
* Merry - cheerful, joyful
* Resplendent - radiant, dazzling
* Cute - adorable, charming
* Fantastic - incredible, remarkable
* Grievous - sorrowful, mournful
* Atrocious - dreadful, appalling
* Torment - anguish, suffering
* Hurting - painful, distressing
* Dreadful - fearful, terrible
* Terrible - awful, unpleasant
* Discredit - dishonor, shame
* Detestable - abhorrent, loathsome

I hope this helps!
